system_url.title: Marketing Instance URL
system_url.description: The base URL of the SAP Marketing Cloud instance you want to register. For example, https://marketing.organization.com

basic_user.title: Basic Auth Username
basic_user.description: The username for the Communication User. The Communication User must already exist in SAP Marketing Cloud and used for all of the Communication Arrangements (used to expose APIs) you want to register in the Extension Factory

basic_password.title: Basic Auth Password
basic_password.description: The password for the Communication User in SAP Marketing Cloud

oauth_client_id.title: Oauth2 client_id
oauth_client_id.description: The OAuth 2.0 Client ID for sending the MQTT events. The OAuth 2.0 credentials are required to configure the Communication Scenario

oauth_client_secret.title: OAuth2 client_secret
oauth_client_secret.description: The OAuth 2.0 Client Secret for sending the MTTQ events

application_name.title: Application Name
application_name.description: The name of the Application CR where the ODATA services and the event catalog should be registered for consumption

cluster_domain.title: Cluster Domain
cluster_domain.description: The domain of the cluster. For example, `demo.kyma.cx`
